homeView.installUpdate: Doorgaan met het installeren van de update?
homeView.patchesConsentDialogText: ReVanced Patches needs to be downloaded.
homeView.patchesConsentDialogText3Sub: You can change this in settings at a later time.
homeView.updatesDisabled: Bijwerken van een gepatchte app is momenteel uitgeschakeld. Patch de app opnieuw.

patcherView.armv7WarningDialogText: Patchen op ARMv7 apparaten zijn nog niet ondersteund en zou mogelijk kunnen misgaan. Toch verder gaan?
patcherView.requiredOptionDialogText: Some patch options have to be set.

appSelectorView.downloadToast: Download functie is nog niet beschikbaar
appSelectorView.featureNotAvailableText: Deze applicatie is een gesplitste APK en kan niet worden geselecteerd. Helaas, deze functie is momenteel alleen beschikbaar voor ROOT-gebruikers. U kunt de applicatie echter nog steeds installeren door de APK-bestanden te selecteren uit de opslag van uw apparaat

patchesSelectorView.noSavedPatches:
No saved patch selection for the selected app.
Press Done to save the current selection.
patchesSelectorView.noPatchesFound: Geen patches gevonden voor de geselecteerde app

patchItem.unsupportedRequiredOption: This patch contains a required option that is not supported by this app
patchItem.patchesChangeWarningDialogText:
It is recommended to use the default patch selection and options. Changing them may result in unexpected issues.

You'll need to turn on "Allow changing patch selection" in settings before changing any patch selection.

installerView.installTypeDescription: Select the installation type to proceed with.
installerView.notificationTitle: ReVanced Manager is aan het patchen
installerView.notificationText: Tik om terug te keren naar het installatieprogramma
installerView.screenshotDetected:
A screenshot has been detected. If you are trying to share the log, please share a text copy instead.

Copy log to clipboard?
installerView.noExit: Het installatieprogramma is nog steeds actief, afsluiten is niet mogelijk...

settingsView.dynamicThemeHint: Geniet van een ervaring dichter bij je apparaat
settingsView.sourcesResetDialogText: Are you sure you want to reset your sources to their default values?
settingsView.apiURLResetDialogText: Are you sure you want to reset your API URL to its default value?
settingsView.sourcesUpdateNote:
Note: Patches will be updated to the latest version automatically.

This will reveal your IP address to the server.
settingsView.contributorsHint: Een lijst met bijdragers van ReVanced
settingsView.enablePatchesSelectionHint: Allow changing the selection of patches
settingsView.enablePatchesSelectionWarningText:
Changing the selection of patches may cause unexpected issues.

Enable anyways?
settingsView.disablePatchesSelectionWarningText:
You are about to disable changing the selection of patches.
The default selection of patches will be restored.

Disable anyways?
settingsView.autoUpdatePatchesHint: Automatically update patches to the latest version
settingsView.universalPatchesHint: Display all apps and universal patches (may slow down the app list)
settingsView.versionCompatibilityCheckHint: Restricts patches to supported app versions
settingsView.restartAppForChanges: Herstart de app om wijzigingen toe te passen
settingsView.exportPatchesHint: Export patch selection to a JSON file
settingsView.importPatchesHint: Import patch selection from a JSON file
settingsView.resetStoredPatchesDialogText: The default selection of patches will be restored.
settingsView.resetStoredOptionsDialogText: Resetting patch options will remove all saved options.
settingsView.regenerateKeystoreHint: Regenerate the keystore used to sign apps
settingsView.regenerateKeystoreDialogText: Patched apps signed with the old keystore will no longer be able to be updated.
settingsView.exportKeystoreHint: Export the keystore used to sign apps
settingsView.importKeystoreHint: Import a keystore used to sign apps
settingsView.selectKeystorePasswordHint: Select keystore password used to sign apps
settingsView.jsonSelectorErrorMessage: Geselecteerde JSON kan niet gebruikt worden
settingsView.keystoreSelectorErrorMessage: Unable to use selected keystore file

appInfoView.unpatchDialogText: Weet je zeker dat je de patches van deze app wilt verwijderen?
appInfoView.rootDialogText:
App is geïnstalleerd met root-rechten, maar op dit moment heeft ReVanced Manager geen rechten.
Verleen eerst root-rechten.
